remarks: Define the set of closed subspaces of a Hilbert space.  A closed subspace is one in which the limit of every convergent sequence in the subspace belongs to the subspace.  For its membership relation, see ~ isch .  From Definition of [Beran] p. 107.  Alternate definitions are given by ~ isch2 and ~ isch3 .  (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
